column1: Uchi////One of our favorite sushi places in Houston. Get ready to spend some $$$
column2: but it's always been an experience! Great food
column5: and dessert. They do happy hour every weekday 4-6pm that includes food and drinks. I haven't had a single bad dish here
column6: nor a single bad experience. They have a variety of wine
column8: and cocktails to chose from on their happy hour menu as well as their regular menu. They offer a variety of sushi
column11: and other entrees for both happy hour and regular menus. They offer a whole vegetarian menu as well. We absolutely love the taste and texture of the kinoko nabe and the nasu sushi on the vegetarian menu. I love the Hama Chilli on the cool tastings main menu. I always look forward to dining here!
